Auth.connectionText: Enter your username and password below to log in.
Auth.accountActivatedText: This account has been confirmed. You will be redirected to the login page.
Auth.registerText: Enter your email, username and password below to register.
Auth.clickAgreement: By clicking continue, you agree to our
Auth.forgotPasswordText: Enter your email address below and we'll send you a code to log in and reset your password.
Auth.registerSuccessMessage: An email confirmation has been sent to continue your registration.

Welcome.heroExplanation: Organize your thoughts, collaborate seamlessly, and boost productivity with our powerful mindmap SaaS platform.

Pricing.heroExplanation: Pay only for what you use with per-request pricing.

Profile.billingText: Manage your billing email address, payment method and view invoices with your account email.

Member.memberText: Enable a collaborations session and invite new people to create awesome mind maps together.
Member.inviteMembersText: Enter or paste one or more email addresses, separated by spaces or commas.

landing.title: Unleash Your Creativity with
landing.description: Transform your ideas into visual masterpieces with Mindgen. Collaborate seamlessly and generate professional documents in minutes!
landing.transformIdeaText: Transform Ideas into Actionable Insights Effortlessly
landing.transformIdeaDescription: With Mindgen, your mindmaps become powerful tools for productivity. Quickly generate user stories, emails, PDF and summaries with a few clicks using quick prompts. Streamline your workflow and boost productivity.
landing.writeQueryDescription: Quickly input text or ask a question directly in the prompt. Perfect for jotting down thoughts, posing inquiries, or adding custom data in a few words
landing.uploadDocumentDescription: Easily import PDFs, documents, or images to add rich content to your mindgen. Uploading files lets you integrate detailed information from multiple sources.
landing.connectExternalDataDescription: Link to external websites, databases, or GitHub repositories to fetch live data or integrate information from your preferred sources for real-time processing.

Error.pageNotFoundDescription: Sorry, the page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
Error.linkExpiredDescription: The password reset link is no longer valid.
